name: Le Pacte
overview: Le Pacte is an horror style adventure game published by the French Company Loriciels in 1986. The story revolves around the player being part of a team sent to investigate the house of Amityville, with two other parapsychologists called Evrett Wilson and Laura Relfod (plus their dog, Black). The game does not use a textual interface, like most of the adventure games of its time; instead the player has to associate two words within a very long list.
